title: Dress Panel, early 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk on cotton foundation
Technique: chain stitch embroidery on plain weave
description: Watteau-style panel for the back of a dress. showing brilliant multi-colored embroidery on a cream-colored ground. Design has ascending, curving flowering vines with flower heads. Embroidery solidly worked with accents, white dots and veining. All flowers are outlined in a contrasting color; leaves and tendrils also in outline. Colors are purple, blue and red, both dark and light.

tombstone.epitaph:
Dress Panel, early 18th century. Medium: silk on cotton foundation
Technique: chain stitch embroidery on plain weave. 1957-157-1.
